LEGAL CASE SUMMARY
Case Information

Case Title: People vs. Robert Johnson
Charge: Theft in the Second Degree
Evidence List
1. Security camera footage from March 15, 2024
2. Witness testimony from store clerk
3. Recovered stolen merchandise
4. Defendant's confession statement

April 1, 2024 - Court date scheduled
